title: Golden Age of Travel
content:
Greater Albion have just released a set of travel poster images in their [gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104631/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/gallery/golden-age-of-travel/). The poster designs all back to a time when travel was all about the fun and experience of seeing a simpler, uncomplicated world. They also showcase our [Brossard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104631/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/brossard/) family, a design with strong European influences, grounded in the 1920s and 30s.

Here's a sample image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104631im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Paris_5797.png)
author: Rasendyll
